document.full_text: egyptian prime minister essam sharaf expressed regret on monday for a violent crackdown on demonstrators in cairo at the weekend and said he had asked the minister of justice to investigate.
document.title: egypt pm pledges probe over protest crackdown
lines_and_colors: egyptian prime minister essam sharaf expressed regret on monday for a violent crackdown on demonstrators in cairo at the weekend and said he had asked the minister of justice to investigate.
